analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.assignTokenContract (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#433-442):
	External calls:
	- hardCap = hardCap.add(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#436-440)
	- hardCap > token.hardCap() (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#440-441)
	- hardCap = token.hardCap() (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- hardCap (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#441)

Hydrocoin.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#324-325) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#124)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#449-465) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#460-461)

Payment.transferToken (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#544-547) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#547)

Payment.fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#548-558) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#554-558)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol)

Reentrancy in Payment.validateLock (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#531-539):
	External calls:
	- weiRaised = preIco.weiRaised() (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#534-535)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lock (/unique_chucks/32/0x9364dd223116f74c5da787220122c722992817de.sol#539)
